attributes.action: Help trainees get their money back from BTSC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BTSC is a plumbing college which uses salesmen to get people into the college take their of money of them and do not do exactly as they state in their agreement. This college is more like a business to them than a college.This should be shut down IMMEDIATELY & all the applicants should be subjected to a full refund.

rejection.details: As we cannot verify your claims, we cannot accept your petition as currently worded.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
